definition: ascending colon (anatomy)/first section of large intestine
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
(of a plant) to produce (fruit or seeds)/Taiwan pr. [jie2]
knot/sturdy/bond/to tie/to bind/to check out (of a hotel)

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the retina cecal-ascending colon continent urinary reservoir.

sentences.english: Always better to start with the right leg as it presses the ascending colon directly.
sentences.chinese: 最好從右腳開始練習，因爲它直接地按升結腸。
